actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to provide more effectively for bilingual proceedings in all district courts of the United States.

summary.text: Bilingual Courts Act - Requires that proceedings in U.S. district courts, in criminal and civil actions, be conducted bilingual where it is determined that a party to, or a witness in, such proceedings does not understand the English language. Directs the Director of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts to determine and supply the personnel and facilities necessary to conduct such proceedings.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to provide more effectively for bilingual proceedings in all district courts of the United States.
